Item Name: How to migrate a Business Catalyst website to Weebly Cloud in 15 minutes
Item Description:
Links

  • Weebly Theme Documentation (https://dev.weebly.com/get-started-with-themes.html)
  • Weebly Cloud Special Offer for BC Partners with steep discounts (https://bc-partners.weebly.com/)
  • BC vs. Weebly Cloud Feature Comparison (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GarQAUgBmJF3d99E8u5gsYRHvxVeFjeaiNrT5TKFENs/edit?usp=sharing)
Photo: /business-catalyst-videos/Moving a BC site to Weebly Cloud in 15 minutes.001.png
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: In this short tutorial you will learn how to move a BC website to the Weebly Cloud platform.
Introduction:
Having been a Business Catalyst Partner for 10 years, the slow pace of development and improvements forced us to look for other platforms. After a long period of research and testing, we chose the Weebly Cloud platform.

In this short video you will learn how to migrate an existing BC website to Weebly Cloud.
